bridge.title: Bridge (Bring Back Cube!)
bridge.description: Transfer your CRAA tokens and CrazyCube NFTs between ApeChain and Solana. Fast, secure, and with minimal fees. Cross-chain for true collectors!

guide.title: ü™Ñ Resurrection Guide
guide.intro: You can bring a cube back from the graveyard by paying a CRAA fee equal to 40% of its current price on OpenSea or Magic Eden.
guide.fee: The fee is calculated automatically from the latest market price and is permanently burned.
guide.requirement: To resurrect, select 2 NFTs that have at least 1 star.
guide.rarity: Star ratings: 1 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Common, 2 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Uncommon, 3 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Rare, 4 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Epic, 5 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Mythic.
guide.penalty: After successful resurrection, each selected NFT loses 1 star.
guide.step1: 1. Approve CRAA spending for the 40% fee.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm the Bridge transaction ‚Äî NFT instantly returns to your wallet.
guide.note: Only 5,000 cubes exist, their number will never change. Burned CRAA goes to dead-wallet; no one can recover it.

burn.title: Burn NFT (Roast the Cube!)
burn.description: Burn NFT and get CRAA tokens! Epic scene of a fiery grill with piercing screaming cubes: "Tell my mom I love her!"

feeBox.title: üî• Burn Fee & Steps
feeBox.line1: ‚Ä¢ Burn fee is <1>10% of locked CRAA</1> inside the cube.
feeBox.step1: 1. Give the contract permission to move your NFT.
feeBox.step2: 2. Allow CRAA spending for 10% of locked coins.
feeBox.step3: 3. Confirm final transaction ‚Äî cube burns, CRAA goes to you.
feeBox.note: Make sure you have enough CRAA in your wallet for the fee before starting.

guide.title: üî• Burn Guide Click here
guide.intro:
This game is fully built on the ApeChain blockchain. All game actions are handled by smart contracts, the website serves only as an information display.
Before burning, MUST ping (once every 7 days) to unlock mined CRAA.
guide.loss: After burning, NFT is permanently sent to the graveyard. CRAA can be claimed in the rewards section.
guide.step1: 1. Give the contract permission to move your NFT.
guide.step2: 2. Allow CRAA spending for 10% of locked coins.
guide.step3: 3. Confirm final transaction ‚Äî cube burns, CRAA goes to you.
guide.timing: CRAA arrives after selected delay (12m / 60m / 255m). During this time cube is gray (cooldown).
guide.note: Example: 10,000 CRAA locked ‚Üí fee 1000 CRAA (10%). Longer delay = smaller pool share.
guide.pingLock: When pinging, CRAA doesn't go to wallet ‚Äî coins stay locked inside NFT. Can only withdraw by burning.
guide.bridgeNote: Resurrect NFT from graveyard in 'Bridge' section. Cube count limited to 5000 and never changes. CRAA burned in each action goes to dead-wallet forever ‚Äî no one can retrieve it.
guide.fees: üîπ CRAA Token Fees ‚Ä¢ 3% fee on transfers ‚Äî goes to game contract ‚Ä¢ 10% fee on DEX sales ‚Äî goes to game contract ‚Ä¢ 0% fee on DEX purchases ‚Äî no fee when buying ‚Ä¢ All fees support the game ecosystem and reward pool

guide.title: ü™Ñ Breeding Guide Click here
guide.intro:
This game is fully built on the ApeChain blockchain. All game actions are handled by smart contracts, the website serves only as an information display.
You can breed a new cube by paying a CRAA fee equal to 40% of its current price on OpenSea or Magic Eden.
guide.fee: The fee is calculated automatically from the latest market price and is permanently burned.
guide.requirement: Select any 2 NFTs with at least 1 ‚≠ê for breeding.
guide.rarity: Star ratings: 1 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Common, 2 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Uncommon, 3 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Rare, 4 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Epic, 5 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Legendary, 6 ‚≠ê ‚Äî Mythic.
guide.step2: 2. Confirm breeding transaction ‚Äî new cube is created, CRAA is burned.
guide.note: Collection limited to 5,000 cubes; CRAA burns to dead-wallet without recovery possibility.

gettingStarted.title: üîπ Getting Started
gettingStarted.getCRAA: ‚Ä¢ Get CRAA tokens ‚Äî for gas fees and game actions
gettingStarted.buyNFTs: ‚Ä¢ Buy CrazyCube NFTs on the marketplace

howToStart.title: üîπ How to Start Playing
howToStart.goToPing: ‚Ä¢ Go to the Ping tab ‚Äî you'll see your NFTs
howToStart.activate: ‚Ä¢ For a new cube, press Activate ‚Äî this is the first Ping, it doesn't give CRAA but starts the timer
howToStart.pingAfterActivation: ‚Ä¢ After activation, you can ping (click Ping). Default is once every 24 hours, rewards start accumulating
howToStart.pingRewards: ‚Ä¢ Each successful Ping brings CRAA ‚Äî amount depends on:
howToStart.experienceBonus: - Your experience bonus ‚Äî grows every 24 hours, without missing pings
howToStart.timeFactor: - Time between pings (if more periods passed, more CRAA)

experienceBonus.title: üîπ What is Experience Bonus
experienceBonus.bonusGrowth: ‚Ä¢ Every 24 hours when you ping you get bonus ‚Äî +2.7%
experienceBonus.maxBonus: ‚Ä¢ Maximum you can reach +97.2% + rarity bonuses also count
experienceBonus.miss10Days: ‚Ä¢ If you miss pings ‚Äî bonus won't increase
experienceBonus.miss20Days: ‚Ä¢ If you miss pings ‚Äî bonus resets to -18.9%

howToGetCRAA.title: üîπ How to Get CRAA
howToGetCRAA.accumulation: ‚Ä¢ CRAA doesn't drop to wallet immediately, but accumulates inside the cube (this way each NFT has real value)
howToGetCRAA.collect: ‚Ä¢ To collect ‚Äî you need to burn the cube (Burn) (your cube goes to graveyard section and no longer belongs to you, you get CRAA coins in the claim section)

howToBurn.title: üîπ How to Burn
howToBurn.restSplit: ‚Ä¢ The rest is split between pool and permanent burning (goes to official dead wallet)
howToBurn.claim: ‚Ä¢ After chosen time, go and press Claim ‚Äî CRAA will come to your wallet

howToRevive.title: üîπ How to Revive Cube (Breed)
howToRevive.choose2Cubes: ‚Ä¢ Choose 2 living cubes (that have stars and are not in cooldown)
howToRevive.payCRAA: ‚Ä¢ Pay CRAA (10% of minimum marketplace price, constantly updated)
howToRevive.randomNFT: ‚Ä¢ Random NFT from graveyard will return to you as new, with all stars but no coins:

crasInSystem.title: üîπ Where CRAA is in the System
crasInSystem.pingRewards: ‚Ä¢ CRAA for Ping comes from monthly reward pool
crasInSystem.breedReturns: ‚Ä¢ CRAA spent on Breed returns to this pool
crasInSystem.burnedGoesTo: ‚Ä¢ Everything burned goes to special wallet 0x...dead official wallet from ApeChain network and disappears forever

crasFees.title: üîπ CRAA Token Fees
crasFees.transferFee: ‚Ä¢ 3% fee on transfers ‚Äî goes to game contract
crasFees.dexSalesFee: ‚Ä¢ 10% fee on DEX sales ‚Äî goes to game contract
crasFees.dexPurchaseFee: ‚Ä¢ 0% fee on DEX purchases ‚Äî no fee when buying
crasFees.feesSupport: ‚Ä¢ All fees support the game ecosystem and reward pool

exampleStrategy.title: üîπ Example Strategy
exampleStrategy.common: ‚Ä¢ Common (regular) ‚Äî ping it, bonus grows by 2.7% every 24 hours up to plus 97%, then stops. Can sell, transfer NFT, bonus is preserved and locked coins in NFT are also preserved
exampleStrategy.rare: ‚Ä¢ Rare ‚Äî use for Breed or accumulate CRAA
exampleStrategy.mystic: ‚Ä¢ Mystic ‚Äî rare, brings more CRAA, better not to burn
exampleStrategy.pingEvery10Days: ‚Ä¢ Once every 24 hours log in and press Ping - you can log in once every 7 days coins accumulate, then no
exampleStrategy.burnWeakCubes: ‚Ä¢ Periodically burn weak cubes ‚Üí get tokens
exampleStrategy.reviveDead: ‚Ä¢ Or revive dead ones ‚Äî get chance for rarer one

tips.title: üí° Tips
tips.maxProfit: Want maximum profit ‚Äî ping regularly and don't burn rare cubes too early.
tips.burnedTokens: üí• Burned tokens won't return ‚Äî this increases the value of remaining CRAA.

vision.title: üöÄ Our Vision
vision.plans: Our plans within 1-2 months are to adjust the gameplay and renounce admin rights on NFT and token contracts. We want to conduct a social experiment and create fully social gameplay where there are no possibilities to change anything ‚Äî only market and people decide.
vision.noBonuses: The team has no bonuses in the contract in the form of CRAA coins. You can create a wallet, for example, in Rabby wallet in 1 minute and play our game.
vision.decentralized: Soon our game will be 100% decentralized with market self-regulation. Also in plans CRAA tokens will be able to be transferred to Solana blockchain and traded, this will make the coin especially valuable, also NFTs will also be able to be transferred to Solana blockchain, and as you know on Solana blockchain there are huge trades both coins and NFTs.

wallet.gameGuideContent:
üéÆ CrazyCube Game Guide

üîπ Getting Started
‚Ä¢ Get CRAA tokens ‚Äî for gas fees and game actions
‚Ä¢ Buy CrazyCube NFTs on the marketplace
‚Ä¢ Before buying, check the NFT in the \"Information\" ‚Üí \"NFT Inspector\" section ‚Äî enter the NFT number and get complete information: amount of locked coins, remaining stars, cooldown status and other parameters

üîπ How to Start Playing
‚Ä¢ Go to the Ping tab ‚Äî you'll see your NFTs
‚Ä¢ For a new cube, press Activate ‚Äî this is the first Ping, it doesn't give CRAA but starts the timer
‚Ä¢ After activation, you can ping (click Ping). Default is once every 24 hours, rewards start accumulating
‚Ä¢ Each successful Ping brings CRAA ‚Äî amount depends on:
  - Cube rarity (Common, Rare, Mystic, etc.)
  - Your experience bonus ‚Äî grows every 24 hours without missing pings
  - Time between pings (if more periods passed, more CRAA)

üîπ What is Experience Bonus
‚Ä¢ Initially all cubes have -18.9% penalty
‚Ä¢ Every 24 hours when you ping you get bonus ‚Äî +2.7%
‚Ä¢ Maximum you can reach +97.2% + rarity bonuses also count
‚Ä¢ If you miss pings ‚Äî bonus won't increase
‚Ä¢ If you miss pings ‚Äî bonus resets to -18.9%

üîπ How to Get CRAA
‚Ä¢ CRAA doesn't drop to wallet immediately, but accumulates inside the cube (this way each NFT has real value)
‚Ä¢ To collect ‚Äî you need to burn the cube (Burn) (your cube goes to graveyard section and no longer belongs to you, you get CRAA coins in the claim section)

üîπ How to Burn
‚Ä¢ Go to Burn section
‚Ä¢ Choose cube and waiting time:
  - 12 minutes ‚Üí 50% to player
  - 60 minutes ‚Üí 70%
  - 255 minutes ‚Üí 80%
‚Ä¢ The rest is split between pool and permanent burning (goes to official dead wallet)
‚Ä¢ After chosen time, go and press Claim ‚Äî CRAA will come to your wallet

üîπ How to Revive Cube (Breed)
‚Ä¢ Go to Breed section
‚Ä¢ Choose 2 living cubes (that have stars and are not in cooldown)
‚Ä¢ Pay CRAA (10% of minimum marketplace price, constantly updated)
‚Ä¢ Random NFT from graveyard will return to you as new, with all stars but no coins:
  - Bonus is reset (back to -18.9%)
  - Stars are restored
  - Can ping again from scratch

üîπ Where CRAA is in the System
‚Ä¢ CRAA for Ping comes from monthly reward pool
‚Ä¢ CRAA spent on Breed returns to this pool
‚Ä¢ CRAA from Burn burns forever
‚Ä¢ Everything burned goes to special wallet 0x...dead and disappears forever

üîπ CRAA Token Fees
‚Ä¢ 3% fee on transfers ‚Äî goes to game contract
‚Ä¢ 10% fee on DEX sales ‚Äî goes to game contract
‚Ä¢ 0% fee on DEX purchases ‚Äî no fee when buying
‚Ä¢ All fees support the game ecosystem and reward pool

üîπ Example Strategy
You have three cubes:
‚Ä¢ Common (regular) ‚Äî ping it, bonus grows by 2.7% every 24 hours up to 97%, then stops. Can sell, transfer NFT, bonus is preserved and locked coins in NFT are also preserved
‚Ä¢ Rare ‚Äî use for Breed or accumulate CRAA
‚Ä¢ Mystic ‚Äî rare, brings more CRAA, better not to burn

Play calmly:
‚Ä¢ Once every 24 hours log in and press Ping
‚Ä¢ Periodically burn weak cubes ‚Üí get tokens
‚Ä¢ Or revive dead ones ‚Äî get chance for rarer one

üí° Tips
Want maximum profit ‚Äî ping regularly and don't burn rare cubes too early.
üí• Burned tokens won't return ‚Äî this increases the value of remaining CRAA.

üöÄ Our Vision
Our plans within 1-2 months are to adjust the gameplay and renounce admin rights on NFT and token contracts. We want to conduct a social experiment and create fully social gameplay where there are no possibilities to change anything ‚Äî only market and people decide.

The team has no bonuses in the contract in the form of CRAA coins. You can create a wallet, for example, in Rabby wallet in 1 minute and play our game.

Soon our game will be 100% decentralized with market self-regulation. Also in plans CRAA tokens will be able to be transferred to Solana blockchain and traded, this will make the coin especially valuable, also NFTs will also be able to be transferred to Solana blockchain, and as you know on Solana blockchain there are huge trades both coins and NFTs.
